title: Calories in a PB Sandwich
meta_description: Discover calories in pb sandwich, including macros like protein and fat, plus nutrition breakdowns and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, no added jelly or extras; standard serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, PB brand, portion size, and additions like jelly. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PB sandwich has about 350 kcal and 13 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a PB sandwich?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for a standard version with 2 slices bread and 2 tbsp PB.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a peanut butter sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 13 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Does a PB sandwich have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 18 g total fat, with 3 g saturated from the PB.

faqs.q: How do carbs break down in a PB sandwich?
faqs.a: About 40 g carbs, including 4 g fiber and 5 g sugars from bread.
